text:
Liga
Bar√ßa: supporters sulk Camp Nou
The Catalans seem to experience the game practiced by Bar√ßa players. The downward influx in recent weeks shows a real disaffection on the part of Barcelona fans.
07 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Mourad Bennis



Bar√ßa's results begin to have an impact in the stands. Indeed, supporters are increasingly sulking Camp Nou because of the performance of the team led by Ernesto Valverde.




Blaugrana do not attract fans anymore




Frenkie De Jong + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Blaugrana remain in uncertainty. Indeed, Bar√ßa is mired in a bad period. Beyond sports results, the game played by men Valverde is far from pleasing the Catalans. This is why the influxes at Camp Nou have been declining for the last few weeks.
On Tuesday night, in the Champions League, Bar√ßa attracted only 67,000 spectators in its den. A week ago, for the reception in Valladolid, 60,000 people from Barcelona were present to support Messi et al. This brand of distrust, dependent on the level of play deployed by the Blaugrana, is also linked to the political crisis in Catalonia.
